doc.author: zhaomingjin
doc.description: 卓越运维故障工单监控报表

sqlquery.name: SQL_FaultIncidentMonitor_Item
sqlquery.select:
select #sel_fields# sum(rs.noaccept) + sum(rs.accept) + sum(rs.complete) 工单总数, sum(rs.noaccept) 未受理工单数, sum(rs.accept) 处理中工单数, sum(rs.complete) 已回复工单数, sum(rs.outtime) 超时工单数 from( select rs2.dep dep, rs2.depid depid, rs2.BaseItems BaseItems, rs2.INC_City INC_City, rs2.INC_Province INC_Province, sum(noa) noaccept, sum(acc) accept, 0 complete, sum(outtime) outtime from( select rs1.dep dep, rs1.depid depid, rs1.BaseID BaseID, rs1.BaseItems BaseItems, rs1.INC_City INC_City, rs1.INC_Province INC_Province, case when #currentTime# > rs1.BaseDealOutTime then 1 else 0 end outtime, case when sum(rs1.FlagBegin) = 0 then 1 else 0 end noa, case when sum(rs1.FlagBegin) > 0 then 1 else 0 end acc from( select case when c700020113 > '0' then c700020113 when dp.c700020007 > '0' then dp.c700020007 when dp.c700020103 > '0' then dp.c700020103 end dep, case when c700020114 > '0' then c700020114 when dp.c700020008 > '0' then dp.c700020008 when dp.c700020104 > '0' then dp.c700020104 end depid, base.c1 BaseID, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province, base.c700000018 BaseDealOutTime, dp.c700020072 FlagBegin from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c1 = dp.c700020001 and base.c700000001 = dp.c700020002 and base.c700000009 is null and dp.c700020020 = 1 and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') --and (dp.c700020008 = '600005' or dp.c700020008 = '600006' or dp.c700020008 = '600007' or dp.c700020008 = '600008') $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs1 where rs1.depid > '0' group by rs1.dep,rs1.depid,rs1.BaseItems,rs1.BaseID,rs1.INC_City,rs1.INC_Province,rs1.BaseDealOutTime ) rs2 group by rs2.dep,rs2.depid,rs2.BaseItems,rs2.INC_City,rs2.INC_Province
union all
select rs3.dep dep, rs3.depid depid, rs3.BaseItems BaseItems, rs3.INC_City INC_City, rs3.INC_Province INC_Province, 0 noaccept, 0 accept, count(rs3.BaseID) complete, sum(rs3.outtime) outtime from( select dp.c700020113 dep, dp.c700020114 depid, base.c1 BaseID, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province, case when dp.c700020017 > base.c700000018 then 1 else 0 end outtime from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c800021006 = dp.c1 and dp.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_TTH' and base.c700000009 is null and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') and dp.c700020114 > '0' $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs3 where rs3.depid > '0' group by rs3.dep,rs3.depid,rs3.BaseItems,rs3.INC_City,rs3.INC_Province ) rs,{UltraProcess:SysGroup} g where --g.c630000019 like '%' || rs.dep || '%' 部门下面的组没有参与统计，如果放开这句，注释下面的那句，就会统计到部门下的组，效率会慢。 ltrim(g.c1,0) = rs.depid and g.c630000021 = '3' and rs.INC_City > '0' and rs.BaseItems > '0' #con_class# $directpar$ #isGroupBy# order by 工单总数 desc

titlecol.urltemp: FaultIncidentMonitor_Link.jsp?netClass=$网络分类$&department=$部门$&depid=$部门ID$&inccity=$故障地市$&timeStart=#timeStart#&timeEnd=#timeEnd#&chooseClass=#chooseClass#&sel_fields=#sel_fields#&incResponseLevel=#incResponseLevel#&flag=total

FaultIncidentMonitor_Link.jsp?netClass=$网络分类$&department=$部门$&depid=$部门ID$&inccity=$故障地市$&timeStart=#timeStart#&timeEnd=#timeEnd#&chooseClass=#chooseClass#&sel_fields=#sel_fields#&incResponseLevel=#incResponseLevel#&flag=noacc

FaultIncidentMonitor_Link.jsp?netClass=$网络分类$&department=$部门$&depid=$部门ID$&inccity=$故障地市$&timeStart=#timeStart#&timeEnd=#timeEnd#&chooseClass=#chooseClass#&sel_fields=#sel_fields#&incResponseLevel=#incResponseLevel#&flag=acc

FaultIncidentMonitor_Link.jsp?netClass=$网络分类$&department=$部门$&depid=$部门ID$&inccity=$故障地市$&timeStart=#timeStart#&timeEnd=#timeEnd#&chooseClass=#chooseClass#&sel_fields=#sel_fields#&incResponseLevel=#incResponseLevel#&flag=complete

FaultIncidentMonitor_Link.jsp?netClass=$网络分类$&department=$部门$&depid=$部门ID$&inccity=$故障地市$&timeStart=#timeStart#&timeEnd=#timeEnd#&chooseClass=#chooseClass#&sel_fields=#sel_fields#&incResponseLevel=#incResponseLevel#&flag=outtime

sqlquery.name: SQL_FaultIncidentMonitor_Link_Total
sqlquery.select:
select /*COUNT*/ --rs.dep dep, --rs.depid depid, rs.BaseID baseid, rs.BaseSN 工单流水号, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') +rs.BaseCreateDate / 86400 + 8 / 24,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, rs.BaseCreatorFullName 建单人, rs.BaseSummary 主题, rs.ResponseLevel 故障处理相应级别, rs.BaseStatus 工单状态 --rs.INC_City INC_City, --rs.INC_Province INC_Province #sel_fields# /*COUNT*/ from( select DISTINCT rs1.BaseID BaseID, rs1.dep dep, rs1.depid depid, rs1.BaseSN BaseSN, rs1.BaseCreateDate BaseCreateDate, rs1.BaseCreatorFullName BaseCreatorFullName, rs1.BaseSummary BaseSummary, rs1.BaseItems BaseItems, rs1.ResponseLevel ResponseLevel, rs1.BaseStatus BaseStatus, rs1.INC_City INC_City, rs1.INC_Province INC_Province from( select case when c700020113 > '0' then c700020113 when dp.c700020007 > '0' then dp.c700020007 when dp.c700020103 > '0' then dp.c700020103 end dep, case when c700020114 > '0' then c700020114 when dp.c700020008 > '0' then dp.c700020008 when dp.c700020104 > '0' then dp.c700020104 end depid, base.c1 BaseID, base.c700000003 BaseSN, base.c700000006 BaseCreateDate, base.c700000004 BaseCreatorFullName, base.c700000011 BaseSummary, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020013 ResponseLevel, base.c700000010 BaseStatus, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c1 = dp.c700020001 and base.c700000001 = dp.c700020002 and base.c700000009 is null and dp.c700020020 = 1 and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs1 where rs1.depid > '0'
union all
select base.c1 BaseID, dp.c700020113 dep, dp.c700020114 depid, base.c700000003 BaseSN, base.c700000006 BaseCreateDate, base.c700000004 BaseCreatorFullName, base.c700000011 BaseSummary, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020013 ResponseLevel, base.c700000010 BaseStatus, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c800021006 = dp.c1 and dp.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_TTH' and base.c700000009 is null and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') and dp.c700020114 > '0' $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs,{UltraProcess:SysGroup} g where ltrim(g.c1,0) = rs.depid and g.c630000021 = '3' $sel_fields$ $directpar$ #con_class# #con_incprovince# #con_city# order by rs.BaseCreateDate desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_FaultIncidentMonitor_Link_Noacc
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ --rs.dep dep, --rs.depid depid, rs.BaseID baseid, rs.BaseSN 工单流水号, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') +rs.BaseCreateDate / 86400 + 8 / 24,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, rs.BaseCreatorFullName 建单人, rs.BaseSummary 主题, rs.ResponseLevel 故障处理相应级别, rs.BaseStatus 工单状态 --rs.INC_City INC_City, --rs.INC_Province INC_Province #sel_fields# /*COUNT*/ from( select rs1.dep dep, rs1.depid depid, rs1.BaseID BaseID, rs1.BaseSN BaseSN, rs1.BaseCreateDate BaseCreateDate, rs1.BaseCreatorFullName BaseCreatorFullName, rs1.BaseSummary BaseSummary, rs1.BaseItems BaseItems, rs1.ResponseLevel ResponseLevel, rs1.BaseStatus BaseStatus, rs1.INC_City INC_City, rs1.INC_Province INC_Province, case when sum(rs1.FlagBegin) = 0 then 1 else 0 end noa from( select case when c700020113 > '0' then c700020113 when dp.c700020007 > '0' then dp.c700020007 when dp.c700020103 > '0' then dp.c700020103 end dep, case when c700020114 > '0' then c700020114 when dp.c700020008 > '0' then dp.c700020008 when dp.c700020104 > '0' then dp.c700020104 end depid, base.c1 BaseID, base.c700000003 BaseSN, base.c700000006 BaseCreateDate, base.c700000004 BaseCreatorFullName, base.c700000011 BaseSummary, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020013 ResponseLevel, base.c700000010 BaseStatus, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province, dp.c700020072 FlagBegin from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c1 = dp.c700020001 and base.c700000001 = dp.c700020002 and base.c700000009 is null and dp.c700020020 = 1 and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs1 where rs1.depid > '0' group by rs1.dep,rs1.depid,rs1.BaseID,rs1.BaseSN,rs1.BaseCreateDate,rs1.BaseCreatorFullName,rs1.BaseSummary,rs1.BaseItems,rs1.ResponseLevel,rs1.BaseStatus,rs1.INC_City,rs1.INC_Province ) rs,{UltraProcess:SysGroup} g where ltrim(g.c1,0) = rs.depid and rs.noa = 1 and g.c630000021 = '3' and rs.INC_City > '0' and rs.BaseItems > '0' $sel_fields$ $directpar$ #con_class# #con_incprovince# #con_city# order by rs.BaseCreateDate desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_FaultIncidentMonitor_Link_Acc
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ --rs.dep dep, --rs.depid depid, rs.BaseID baseid, rs.BaseSN 工单流水号, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') +rs.BaseCreateDate / 86400 + 8 / 24,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, rs.BaseCreatorFullName 建单人, rs.BaseSummary 主题, rs.ResponseLevel 故障处理相应级别, rs.BaseStatus 工单状态 --rs.INC_City INC_City, --rs.INC_Province INC_Province #sel_fields# /*COUNT*/ from( select rs1.dep dep, rs1.depid depid, rs1.BaseID BaseID, rs1.BaseSN BaseSN, rs1.BaseCreateDate BaseCreateDate, rs1.BaseCreatorFullName BaseCreatorFullName, rs1.BaseSummary BaseSummary, rs1.BaseItems BaseItems, rs1.ResponseLevel ResponseLevel, rs1.BaseStatus BaseStatus, rs1.INC_City INC_City, rs1.INC_Province INC_Province, case when sum(rs1.FlagBegin) = 0 then 1 else 0 end noa from( select case when c700020113 > '0' then c700020113 when dp.c700020007 > '0' then dp.c700020007 when dp.c700020103 > '0' then dp.c700020103 end dep, case when c700020114 > '0' then c700020114 when dp.c700020008 > '0' then dp.c700020008 when dp.c700020104 > '0' then dp.c700020104 end depid, base.c1 BaseID, base.c700000003 BaseSN, base.c700000006 BaseCreateDate, base.c700000004 BaseCreatorFullName, base.c700000011 BaseSummary, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020013 ResponseLevel, base.c700000010 BaseStatus, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province, dp.c700020072 FlagBegin from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c1 = dp.c700020001 and base.c700000001 = dp.c700020002 and base.c700000009 is null and dp.c700020020 = 1 and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs1 where rs1.depid > '0' group by rs1.dep,rs1.depid,rs1.BaseID,rs1.BaseSN,rs1.BaseCreateDate,rs1.BaseCreatorFullName,rs1.BaseSummary,rs1.BaseItems,rs1.ResponseLevel,rs1.BaseStatus,rs1.INC_City,rs1.INC_Province ) rs,{UltraProcess:SysGroup} g where ltrim(g.c1,0) = rs.depid and rs.noa = 0 and g.c630000021 = '3' and rs.INC_City > '0' and rs.BaseItems > '0' $sel_fields$ $directpar$ #con_class# #con_incprovince# #con_city# order by rs.BaseCreateDate desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_FaultIncidentMonitor_Link_Complete
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ --rs.dep dep, --rs.depid depid, rs.BaseID baseid, rs.BaseSN 工单流水号, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') +rs.BaseCreateDate / 86400 + 8 / 24,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, rs.BaseCreatorFullName 建单人, rs.BaseSummary 主题, rs.ResponseLevel 故障处理相应级别, rs.BaseStatus 工单状态 --rs.INC_City INC_City, --rs.INC_Province INC_Province #sel_fields# /*COUNT*/ from( select dp.c700020113 dep, dp.c700020114 depid, base.c1 BaseID, base.c700000003 BaseSN, base.c700000006 BaseCreateDate, base.c700000004 BaseCreatorFullName, base.c700000011 BaseSummary, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020013 ResponseLevel, base.c700000010 BaseStatus, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c800021006 = dp.c1 and dp.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_TTH' and base.c700000009 is null and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') and dp.c700020114 > '0' $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs,{UltraProcess:SysGroup} g where ltrim(g.c1,0)=rs.depid and g.c630000021 = '3' and rs.INC_City > '0' and rs.BaseItems > '0' $sel_fields$ $directpar$ #con_class# #con_incprovince# #con_city# order by rs.BaseCreateDate desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_FaultIncidentMonitor_Link_Outtime
sqlquery.select:
select /*COUNT*/ --rs.dep dep, --rs.depid depid, rs.BaseID baseid, rs.BaseSN 工单流水号, to_char(to_date('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') +rs.BaseCreateDate / 86400 + 8 / 24,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, rs.BaseCreatorFullName 建单人, rs.BaseSummary 主题, rs.ResponseLevel 故障处理相应级别, rs.BaseStatus 工单状态 --rs.INC_City INC_City, --rs.INC_Province INC_Province #sel_fields# /*COUNT*/ from( select DISTINCT rs1.BaseID BaseID, rs1.dep dep, rs1.depid depid, rs1.BaseSN BaseSN, rs1.BaseCreateDate BaseCreateDate, rs1.BaseCreatorFullName BaseCreatorFullName, rs1.BaseSummary BaseSummary, rs1.BaseItems BaseItems, rs1.ResponseLevel ResponseLevel, rs1.BaseStatus BaseStatus, rs1.INC_City INC_City, rs1.INC_Province INC_Province from( select case when c700020113 > '0' then c700020113 when dp.c700020007 > '0' then dp.c700020007 when dp.c700020103 > '0' then dp.c700020103 end dep, case when c700020114 > '0' then c700020114 when dp.c700020008 > '0' then dp.c700020008 when dp.c700020104 > '0' then dp.c700020104 end depid, base.c1 BaseID, base.c700000003 BaseSN, base.c700000006 BaseCreateDate, base.c700000004 BaseCreatorFullName, base.c700000011 BaseSummary, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020013 ResponseLevel, base.c700000010 BaseStatus, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c1 = dp.c700020001 and base.c700000001 = dp.c700020002 and base.c700000009 is null and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') and base.c800021006 is null and dp.c700020020 = 1 and #current# > base.c700000018 $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs1 where rs1.depid > '0'
union all
select base.c1 BaseID, dp.c700020113 dep, dp.c700020114 depid, base.c700000003 BaseSN, base.c700000006 BaseCreateDate, base.c700000004 BaseCreatorFullName, base.c700000011 BaseSummary, base.c700000014 BaseItems, base.c800020013 ResponseLevel, base.c700000010 BaseStatus, base.c800020022 INC_City, base.c800020021 INC_Province from {WF:EL_TTM_TTH} base, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp where base.c800021006 = dp.c1 and dp.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_TTH' and base.c700000009 is null and (dp.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_4' or dp.c700020003 = 'dp_6') and dp.c700020114 > '0' and dp.c700020017 > base.c700000018 $con_time$ $con_responseLevel$ ) rs,{UltraProcess:SysGroup} g where ltrim(g.c1,0) = rs.depid and g.c630000021 = '3' and rs.INC_City > '0' and rs.BaseItems > '0' $sel_fields$ $directpar$ #con_class# #con_incprovince# #con_city# order by rs.BaseCreateDate desc
